issue.title: [Doc] Add Glossary to the New Contributor's Guide
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16949](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16949). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15130 is merged, we can add reference to it from the New Contributor's Guide (<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/developers/guide/resources.rst>).

comments.body:
